entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp3w06yn35\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0117.9574] In the statement 00100 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations the concept us-gaap:DirectOperatingCosts with a value of 200,855,000 is not equal to the dimensional breakdown of 76,114,000 which is comprised of the members: FoodAndBeverageMember --> 6,308,000 --> srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=us-gaap:FoodAndBeverageMember CommissionsTransportationAndOtherMember --> 9,033,000 --> srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=nclh:CommissionsTransportationAndOtherMember ServiceOtherMember --> 59,514,000 --> srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=us-gaap:ServiceOtherMember OnboardAndOtherMember --> 1,259,000 --> srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=nclh:OnboardAndOtherMember
On the face financial statements it is expected that values reported are dimensionally complete for a given line item. If you added up the values of the dimensions the resulting sum should represent the actual aggregate value. This rule takes the dimensional values of an axis reported on the face financial statements and adds them up and compares them to the actual aggregate value reported anywhere in the filing. If they are different the rule reports an error.
The properties of this us-gaap:DirectOperatingCosts fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-03-31 Unit : USD Dimensions : Rule Element Id:9574 Rule version: 16.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1513761/000155837021006631/nclh-20210331x10q.htm 11
